metadata.title: CVE-2017-5412 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
A buffer overflow read during SVG filter color value operations, resultingin data exposure. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 52 and Thunderbird <52.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5412` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
